title: Where the wild things are
creator_credit: Kratky Film, Weston Woods Studios, Morton Schindel and Gene Deitch
brief_description: Presents an animated adaptation of the story of the same title by Maurice Sendak in which a small boy makes a visit to the land of the wild things. Tells how he tames the creatures and returns home. Animation: Bohumil Sejda. Suitable for lower and middle primary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Kratky Film, Weston Woods Studios, Morton Schindel and Gene Deitch
